issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We have a number of security vulnerabilities now listed by default on npm installs (as of npm 6 this is built into the process). We should try to update all of our npm package dependencies as much as possible, as well as attempt to drive down the security vulnerabilities listed as low as possible (ideally none).

This has knock-on effects on all of the npm packages we generate and dependencies upon in the SDK, so this will include fixes for things like node-appc, ioslib, windowslib, appc-aar-tools, etc.
fields.summary: Update npm package dependencies and reduce security vulnerabilities listed
